Description: 
Are you in search of a quick and easy video downloader for social apps? VidDe makes it easy for you to download any video available on social accounts. The application provides you with a fast and reliable way to download videos from your social sites, including Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp. You can quickly download and save any video from multiple social media sites with VidDe video downloader. 
You can save stories and download videos by using a video URL or link. Moreover, you can download videos with a single link. Fortunate, you can directly get it into your device gallery. VidDe supports all video formats available on the internet, which helps you to save videos of all formats. 

How to Download Through this App?

Downloading videos from your social network accounts is very easy with VidDe. 


1. App has a built-in video downloader. The browser visits the targeted webpage with a built-in downloader from where you want to download the video. 
2. First of all, you need to play the video that you want to save. Just below the video “Download” button will appear. 
3. Now press the "Download" button, and the video will start downloading on your device. 
4. You can also watch the video before starting the video downloading. 

What is Included in This app?


WhatsApp Status Downloader: 
VidDe lets you download videos, status, GIF, and new status feature 2021 videos from WhatsApp. You can easily save and download WhatsApp videos and status to your device gallery with our free video downloader app. 

Instagram Downloader: 
You can download Instagram stories, IGTV, reels, and highlight very easily with VidDe. You don’t need any extra steps to download Instagram videos. Simply click on the “Download” button right below the video to download videos and stories. 

Facebook Downloader: 
VidDe allows you to download videos from videos and stories from Facebook. You just simply paste the Facebook video link or URL and download the video to your device. Also, you can download the Facebook app with VidDe.

There are some terms and conditions that you should follow while using the VidDe video downloader. 
● Before reposting the video, try to get permission from the video owner. 
● This video downloading app is not officially linked with social network platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, WhatsApp, etc. 
● We don’t have any link with any intellectual property copyright that may arise due to uncertified use of content. 
● This app does not support video downloading from YouTube due to the Play Store privacy policy. 
● The downloading of copyright-protected content or files is prohibited and controlled by state law.
